Subscription.Description: Events for Windows servicing & software changes
Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Application"> <!-- Servicing package installed --> <Select Path="Setup"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Servicing'] and Level=0 and EventID=2]] and *[UserData[CbsPackageChangeState[IntendedPackageState='Installed']]] </Select>
<!-- MSI installed --> <Select Path="Application"> *[System[Provider[@Name='MsiInstaller'] and (EventID=1022 or EventID=1033)]] </Select>
<!-- Application inventory --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience/Program-Inventory"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience'] and EventID=800]] </Select>
<!-- Application installed --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience/Program-Inventory"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience'] and (EventID=903 or EventID=904)]] </Select>
<!-- Application updated --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience/Program-Inventory"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience'] and (EventID=905 or EventID=906)]] </Select>
<!-- Application removed --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience/Program-Inventory"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience'] and (EventID=907 or EventID=908)]] </Select> </Query>
<Query Id="1" Path="System"> <!-- Kernel filter driver installed --> <Select Path="System"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-FilterManager'] and (Level=4 or Level=0) and EventID=6]] </Select>
<!-- Windows update installed --> <Select Path="System"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-WindowsUpdateClient'] and EventID=19]] </Select>
<!-- Service installed --> <Select Path="System"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Service Control Manager'] and Level=1 and EventID=7045]] </Select> </Query> </QueryList>
